txt.en: 'Cave-trolls? I have not heard of such venturing so far from Moria....\n\n'This is dire news, indeed.'
Arrod is at his camp on the cliff south-west of the troll-cave.\n\nYou should return to Arrod with tidings of your discovery in the troll-cave.
You defeated the hendroval, but saw few trolls, though they may be holed up in their cave.
You should scout inside the cave and learn of the trolls' numbers
These Cave-trolls are far hardier than the Stone-trolls you encountered elsewhere in the Trollshaws
The entrance to the troll-cave is north-east of Arrod's camp.\n\nYou should scout inside the cave, as there are few trolls outside during the light of day.
The entrance to the troll-cave is north-east of Arrod's camp.\n\nYou should scout inside the cave, as there are few trolls outside during the light of day.
The entrance to the troll-cave is north-east of Arrod's camp.\n\nYou should scout inside the cave, as there do not seem to be too many trolls outside.
